basic_flat_buffer::basic_flat_buffer (4 of 10 overloads)

Constructor.

Synopsis 
basic_flat_buffer(
    std::size_t limit,
    Allocator const& alloc);
Description

After construction, basic_flat_buffer::capacity will return zero, and basic_flat_buffer::max_size will return the specified value of limit.

Parameters

Name

Description

limit

The desired maximum size.

alloc

The allocator to use for the object.

Exception Safety

No-throw guarantee.
